channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Escape Room 3 Needs To Happen — Why I'm Worried About The Horror Franchise's Future
item.description: Following Escape Room: Tournament of Champions, I’m worried about the future of the franchise, but Escape Room 3 definitely needs to happen.

item.title: Josh Holloway's Lost Reunion Series Copies One Thing That Made Sawyer The Island's Best Character
item.description: Josh Holloway and J.J. Abrams are reuniting in Duster, and there are already significant parallels between Sawyer and Holloway's Duster character.

item.title: 10 Biggest Superhero Power Upgrades In Comic Book Movie & Show History
item.description: Some of the most satisfying parts of comic book movies and TV shows are the chances to watch heroes get more powerful by a variety of means.
